surname Ping

Pingxi or Pinghsi township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan

sentences.english: People release sky lanterns to celebrate the Lantern Festival in Pingsi District, New Taipei City on Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 民衆上週六在新北市平溪區平溪國中施放天燈慶元宵。

sentences.english: People release sky lanterns to celebrate the Lantern Festival in Pingsi District, New Taipei City on Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 民衆上週六在新北市平溪區平溪國中施放天燈慶元宵。

sentences.english: A train approaches Shihfen Station in Pingsi District, New Taipei City.
sentences.chinese: 火車正駛入位於新北市平溪區的十分車站。

sentences.english: A map of New Taipei City's Pingsi District.
If you want to observe the Lantern Festival in a traditional way, hop on the train to Pinhsi.
sentences.chinese: 您若想過個傳統的元宵節，那就坐上開往平溪的火車。

sentences.english: Departure semaphore signal at Shi-Fen Station, Ping-Hsi Line.
sentences.chinese: 平溪線十分站內的出發臂木信號機。

sentences.english: Arrival semaphore signal at Shi-Fen Station, Ping-Hsi Line.
sentences.chinese: 平溪線十分站內的進站臂木信號機。
